title: Is there a way to copy + paste tabs from phones and tablets?
content:
I love Firefox for Mac, but, on iPad and iPhone, it's impossible to use extensions such as Winger to save tabs. Too many times, I've lost 100 to 200 tabs at once, and so I switched back on iPad and iPhone to Safari. I never had a problem with Safari's built-in window-tab saver on iPad and iPhone but lost thousands of tabs on Mac, hence my move to Firefox on Mac.

On Firefox on Mac, when I click on Firefox View, I can view tabs from other devices, but there's no way to copy multiple tab links at once (you have to go one by one). If I ever were to shift back to Firefox for iPad and iPhone, does anyone know of a way to easily save 100 to 200 tabs from these devices?

I would rather use Firefox because I can't stand how Safari opens links from outside Safari, forcing the use of some new default window over the named window I already have open. It's so much work to micro-manage this browser.

Thank you kindly and enjoy a super day!

title: Logged out of everything after closing Firefox
content:
I have websites I frequent like Youtube and my email set to 'remember me' so I don't log back in every time I open Firefox. Recently, for some reason, whenever I close Firefox I am logged out of everything, and if I open it again I have to log back in to all the services I use.

Settings I think may be relevant to this issue:

  • Enhanced tracking protection is set to standard
  • "Delete cookies and site data when Firefox is closed" is set to false
  • "Remember browsing and download history" is set to true
  • "Remember search and form history" is set to true
  • "Clear history when Firefox closes" is set to false

I have not changed my account settings at all, and this problem has only cropped up in the past few days, leading me to believe it could be something to do with a new update? I'm no expert though, I just know this is driving me mad.
creator: mollyselby01

title: My whole Firefox has reset
content: I did not have an account, (i made it js now to ask the question) but every time i opened firefox everything was saved, my search history, pinned pages, PASSWORDS, (which are all gone and its the worst thing in this situation) accounts on multiple websites, and this type things, EVEN when there were some updates to the app. And the latest profile update, yes i was scared for a second that itll all be gone when i made the new profile but i saw theres another profile with all my things saved. But now, i open the app, and its like i just installed firefox. There are some business tings to set up, they asked me if i want to create a new account, some things i just skipped, then i look and its a whole fresh app. No passwords, no extensions i had, no theme i set up, no saved search history, NOTHING. Now is this normal, and my fault because i didnt have an account? Because im pretty sure that shouldnt happen and i really need all those things. But if its my fault then i get it, although im still a bit upset but if theres any way to recover, or prevent this from happening next time, please let me know.
